  • Constructor Details

    • CreateNumBoards

      public CreateNumBoards(int numBoards, Integer maxDeadBoards)
      Request a count of boards. The service may over-allocate.
      Parameters:
      numBoards - The number of boards desired.
      maxDeadBoards - The number of dead boards that can be tolerated within that.
